positions.title: VP, Technical Operations & Interim CISO
positions.description: Responsible for Security, Data Warehouse, Business Systems (ERP, CRM, & HRIS), Internal Tools, DevOps, IT, Real Estate and Workplace Operations.

positions.title: Senior Director, Information Security Officer
positions.description: Directed all DevOps, IT, Test Engineering, SRE, and Security teams. Responsible for org-wide security policies and systems, development of information security and privacy strategy, and ensuring that Knewton meets all mandated security and compliance standards. Lead expansion into China.

positions.title: CEO
positions.description: Unleash your cloud -- Cloudmancer integrates dissimilar virtualization technologies and transforms them into a single, interconnected cloud platform.

positions.title: Founder
positions.description: Designed and hosted public CTF's (a type of information security competition) for security research and recruiting purposes. Notable events include sequential years of oCTF (a black badge status contest at DefCon), TubeWarriors CTF, BSides WebApp CTFs, and jointly delivering STEM CTF with MITRE.

positions.title: Principal Security Architect
positions.description: Team-lead and senior architect of 'Cyber Range' -- a platform to facilitate next generation training and research for cyber security personnel and nation-state agencies.

given.text:
Dan has literally put top-notch candidates in seats before I could even finish writing a formal job description. With his command over recruiting and pairing the right people to the right problems, he was a tremendous asset in building out my teams at Knewton. Likewise, he did an equally impressive job at growing his own team. While I miss working with Dan on a regular basis, his leadership enabled his team to provide the same white-glove service he himself was capable of. Business has never been better.
